settings.heading: Getting started.
settings.text1: Your pet medications will be delivered straight to your door anywhere you are in New Zealand.
settings.text2: Your pet medications will be delivered straight to your door anywhere you are in New Zealand.
settings.text3: Your pet medications will be delivered straight to your door anywhere you are in New Zealand.

settings.heading: Is it cheaper to get my pet’s medicines through PillDrop Pets rather than going through my vets?
settings.content:
Yes, with no middlemen, no price games and buying medications in bulk, we can pass the savings to you.
Generally, you will be looking at paying 20% cheaper than getting it at the vets.

settings.heading: Do you stock the same medicines as my vet?
settings.content: Yes, we offer the same prescription medicines and vet-only nutraceuticals as your vet, but at a lower price.

settings.heading: There’s a medication I need that’s not on your website.
settings.content: As one of New Zealand’s largest dispensaries, we stock most pet medicines. However, if you can’t see it on our website, please give us a call on: 0800 745 537

settings.heading: When can I expect to receive my pet’s medication?
settings.content:
For prescription items:
Once we have received your vet’s prescription, we will sent it out within one business day.


For non-prescription items:
For vet-only, non-prescription items, such as vitamins, we will process within 24 hours from receiving
the order, or the following business day (please see our delivery schedule below).
